page.title: 11Brigham Police H.Q.
page.content: {The West Division H.Q.}is a modern building that has been used by the police since 1969, and has an office block with five floors. Beside the block there is a garage for maintaining the division's vehicles . There are{13 vehicles}always based at Brigham: 6 cars, 3 motorbikes, 3 plain vehicles and 1 Range Rover. The garage is made of corrugated iron. The police cars are nicknamed jam sandwiches. There is a large room called a {conference room}which can be used as a major incident room. The most recent incident was the French girl in Wastwater which was called the"Lady in the Lake". There is an infra red eye on the second floor for security reasons.
